name: Parallel Driver
description:
In the “Many Worlds” interpretation of quantum theory, parallel universes can interact with our own.
Thus, the parallel driver was born...

This game was made in about 48 hours for the libGDX Jam of September 2020. My take on the theme of "Parallel Worlds" was inspired by the fabulous Does Not Commute game.

The only controls are to turn left or right. Press R if you screwed up and want to reset the level. Use the JAR version for better performance: requires JDK 11.
